column2: Military Technology
column3: Technologie militaire

column3: Sciences sociales

column3: Sciences naturelles

column2: Kinetic Weapons
Energy Weapons
column3: Armes à énergie

column2: Missiles
column3: Missiles

column2: Intel and Sensors
Infantry
Recruiting and Training

column1: #§M"I am not interested in 'playing God'. I am offended by the very suggestion. I have seen His handiwork, and would never lower myself to such an amateur level."\n - Doctor Ambrose Bacon, Genetic Algorithms§!\nResearch into genetic manipulation and engineering, including human cloning and human genetic modification.

#§M"After conclusive review of all previous projects, we have determined that artificial general intelligence is either impossible or already achieved. We recommend future study be confined to narrower domains."\n - Report to the University of Tau Ceti§!\nResearch into the development of artificial intelligence, including more advanced combat techniques for Combat Drones.

column2: Physique de l'hyperespace

column1: #§M"The terrifying reality of the Tunneller Device, the machine at the heart of modern civilization, is that while we know what it does, we haven't the foggiest clue how it does it."\n - Doctor Jian Qiu, Fundamentals of Transuniversal Physics§!\nMuch of hyperspace remains a mystery to us. Perhaps further research in this area could allow us to shorten jump times and construct superior navigation systems.
column2: L'hyperespace reste un mystère presque total pour nous. Peu être que des recherches dans ce domaine nous permettraient de raccourcir les temps de saut et de concevoir de meilleurs systèmes de navigation.

§M"Getting into a tin can and throwing yourself into the vacuum of space is dangerous enough BEFORE someone starts shooting you."\n - Captain Gamalat Quteishat, Lecture Notes§!\nResearch into new forms of armor can improve the survivability of warships in combat.
column3: La recherche de nouvelles formes de blindages peu améliorer les chances de survie au combat des vaisseaux de guerre.

column2: §M"The paradox of modern warfare is that even though we possess weapons any historical commander would consider perfect, we encounter such combat conditions that they somehow remain fallible."\n - Vice-Admiral Kwanza Husani, Ares Academy Handbook§!\nEnergy weapons, primarily lasers and particle cannons, are the single most common ship-to-ship combat weapon.
column3: Les armes à énergie, principalement des laser et des cannons à particules, forment l'armement individuel de base pour les combats de vaisseau à vaisseau.

column2: §M"The first and most important rule of space combat is to be as far away from it as humanly possible."\n - Captain Gamalat Quteishat, Lecture Notes§!\nMissiles are an excellent weapon for use against large ships, and are most commonly mounted on small bombers.
column3: Les missiles sont une armes parfaite contre les grands navires, et sont généralement installés sur de petits bombardiers.
Recherche de tactiques de combat plus avancées pour les destroyers, croiseurs de bataille, et cuirassés.

Bien que de moindre importance par rapport à l'hyperespace dans la majeur partie des voyages au long cours, la propulsion sousluminique conventionnelle joue un rôle vital au combat, spécialement pour préserver la survie de petits vaisseaux comme les chasseurs.

column2: §M"The pride of this institution is that no matter what or who you were when you entered, you will be a soldier when you leave."\n - Yun Zhu, History of the First Thirteen§!\nResearch into the best methods for properly training a modern military.
column3: Recherche de tactiques de combat plus avancées pour les chasseurs et bombardiers.

column2: Xeno Terraforming
column3: Xénobiologie

column2:
Xenostudies and Terraforming
§M"I am a humanitarian. My project is for the benefit of humanity. I will not sacrifice meaningful human lives for the benefit of mindless viruses and fungi."
 - Yuri Solomonov, Response to the Xenological Conservation Council§!
Research into anything about life in planets outside Earth, from farming, colonization, terraforming or hunting techniques.
column3: Recherche sur les origines de la vie extraterrestre, pouvant améliorer l'éspérance de vie de nos administrés dans les environements extraterrestres hostiles.

column2: Education
column3: Education

column2: §M"Secrecy is ignorance. What only the few know, none know. The greatest achievement in human history was the democratization of knowledge."\n - Director-General Bhagnirathy Srivastava, A Call to Reason§!\nResearch into superior teaching methods and academic organization.
column3: Recherche de nouvelles méthodes d'enseignement supérieur et d'organisation académique.

column2: Economics

§M"For millennia, humanity made do with ONE planet. Explain to me again how you cannot possibly turn a profit with three."\n - Robert Weyland, Weyland Industries Internal Memorandum§!\nResearch into the best means for extracting government revenue from interstellar and local economies.
column3: Recherche sur les meilleurs moyens de relever les taxes dans les économies interstellaires.

column2: Interstellar Trade
column3: Commerce interstellaire

column2: §M"Some would blame the Crisis on the folly of the Periphery, others on the arrogance of the old Confederation. These high dramas conceal the prosaic truth - that it was an inevitable consequence of a fundamental failure of logistics."\n - Professor Hong Gao, Observations from Captivity§!\nResearch into the effects of globalized economies, modern shipping technology, and time dilation on interstellar trade.
column3: Recherche sur les effets des économies globalisées, les technologies logistiques modernes, et la dilatation du temps dans le commerce interstellaire.

column2: Public Service

§M"The purpose of the state is to provide for its people. If it cannot fulfill its purpose, then it must be repaired. If it cannot be repaired, then it must be discarded."\n - Governor-General Juan Lebedev, Coming of Age§!\nResearch into new techniques for providing public services on a global scale.
column3: Recherche dans le développement d'intelligences artificielles, comprenant l'étude de techniques de combat avancées pour les drônes militaires.

column2: Sociology
column3: Sociologie

column2: §M"The sole measure of a leader is the loyalty and devotion of their followers. All else is posturing."\n - Captain-General Tao Luo, Principles of Statecraft§!\nResearch into modern social hierarchies and power structures, and the best methods for modern leadership.
column3: Recherche sur les hiérarchies sociales modernes et les structures de pouvoir, et les meilleurs méthode pour affirmer sa supériorité.

column2: Engineering
Medicine
column3: Médecine

column2: §M"God tests us, and we must rise to meet His challenge. This curse cannot stand against human ingenuity."\n - Yuri Solomonov, Address at Posadka§!\nResearch into the effects of, and possible treatments for, extraterrestrial diseases.
column3: Recherche sur les effets, et les traitements potentiels, des maladies extraterrestres.

column2: Cybernetics
column3: Cybernétique

column2: §M"Where exactly within the human body does this 'humanity' lie? You say it remains when you cut off a child's arm, but vanishes when I build them a new one. I find the value of such a thing questionable."\n - Director-General Bhagnirathy Srivastava, A Call to Reason§!\nResearch into both techniques for and applications of human mechanical augmentation.
column3: Recherche sur la théorie et les applications des augmentations mécaniques de l'Humain.

column2: Propulsion

§M"Reaching the limits inside the tyranny of the rocket equation was a development second only to the discovery of hyperspace in terms of its importance to human history."\n - Vice-Admiral Kwanza Husani, Ares Academy Handbook§!\nAlthough the discovery of hyperspace briefly made humanity think they were finally freed from the shackles of the speed of light, the difficulty in building the tunneler ships, and the fact nobody really knows how they really work, sent those dreams crashing down again. This research is fundamental to speed-up space travel using jump-gates, also the increased engine power make ship engines into formidable defensive weapons. Also being able to outrun missiles or dodge slugs shot from afar is a nice bonus too.
column3: Recherche sur la manipulation et l'ingénieurie génétique, y compris le clônage et les modifications du génôme humain.

column2: Superscale Construction

§M"The people of an entire world, united by a common goal and a common bond, are capable of anything."\n - Director-General Ekateirna Leonidov, History of the Fourth Millennium (2576 Edition)§!\nResearch on how best to integrate and manage labor and industry on a global scale enabling large construction projects, it is an essential technology for the construction of large scale orbitcal structures.
Drydocks

§M"The situation at Ahora la Luz is unlikely to improve until Mars starts sending me less midshipmen and more ships."\n - Fleet Admiral Zeal Dravid, Report to Grand Admiral Wei Luo§!\nResearch into the construction of space-based facilities that work in coordination with other space stations or ground facilities, for the purpose of building big capital ships in space.
This technology affects your commanders chance of detecting enemy flagships during combat.
Sufficient technology to build protective domes in rocky planets or floating stations in gas giants.
Sufficient technology to build huge protective domes in rocky planets or floating stations in gas giants, with better shielding too.
Sufficient technology to turn areas around the colony work-able, allowing farming with plants compatible with local environment, mining with less protection suits and so on.
Sufficient technology to make the whole planet habitable for humans, allowing farming with plants originally from Earth.
This building allows construction of destroyer retinues.
This building allows construction of battleship retinues.
This building alongside some others on same type of holding allows construction of battleship retinues.
